# Plain Markdown Consumer Test

## Headings

Markdown uses `#` symbols to create headings.

### Subheading

Normal text is written as plain paragraphs.

## Lists

- This is a bullet list
- You can nest lists
    - Nested item 1
    - Nested item 2

1. This is an ordered list
2. Second item
3. Third item

## Emphasis

- **Bold text**
- *Italic text*
- ~~Strikethrough~~

## Blockquote

> This is a blockquote.

## Links and Images

![Sample Image](https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/96863644?s=400&v=4)

## Code

Inline code uses backticks â†’ `println("Hello")`

```kotlin
fun main() {
    println("Hello, Markdown!")
}
```
